content.title: Blue Rubber Bleb Nevus Syndrome
content.description: Rare disorder with multiple venous malformations of skin and GI tract causing chronic GI bleeding.

clinical_features.presentation: Chronic GI bleeding, iron deficiency anemia

treatment.surgical: Resection of accessible lesions, sirolimus shows promise

content.clinical_pearl: Sirolimus (mTOR inhibitor) has shown benefit in reducing lesion size and bleeding
